description: Pandora is the human woman responsible to "bring the evil on Earth", as she is depicted in mythology. She reincarnates in every era Hades has to resurrect, choosing a mortal host suitable for her master`s might. In Lost Canvas she is depicted as being so attached to Hades to the point of hysteria and paranoia, nevertheless she is a merciless and loyal servant of the God of the Underworld. She is used as a pawn of Hypnos and Thanatos schemes.
name: Pandora
